briefTitle: Clinical Trial of Sodium Nitrite for Out of Hospital Cardiac Arrest

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Cardiac arrest, either VF or non-VF, patients receiving ACLS by paramedics
* IV or IO access
* Comatose

Exclusion Criteria:

* traumatic cause of cardiac arrest
* prisoner, pregnancy
* known DNAR

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants Who Survived to Hospital Admission
outcomeMeasures.description: Patient has sustained pulse at arrival to the emergency department

outcomeMeasures.title: Survival to Discharge
outcomeMeasures.description: Patient alive at time of discharge from hospital

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Days in ICU
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of days the patient is admitted to the Intensive Care Unit

outcomeMeasures.title: Survival to 24 Hours
outcomeMeasures.description: Patient is alive after the first 24 hours after admission to the hospital

outcomeMeasures.title: Re-arrest
outcomeMeasures.description: Patient loses pulses during transport to the hospital. Event occurs before admission to hospital.

outcomeMeasures.title: Survival to 48 Hours After Admission to Hospital
outcomeMeasures.description: Patient is alive after first 48 hours after admission to the hospital

outcomeMeasures.title: Survival to 72 Hours After Admission to Hospital
outcomeMeasures.description: Patient is alive after first 72 hours after admission to the hospital
